DOC.brief_summary: Previous study demonstrate defect traffic translocation GLUT4 glucose transporter skeletal muscle adipose tissue major cause insulin resistance human . IRAP ( Secreted Insulin Regulated AminoPeptidase ) protein collocalizes translocate GLUT4 plasma membrane response insulin . The extracellular domain IRAP cleave release bloodstream . Therefore , IRAP plasma concentration could good marker insulin sensitivity . In study investigator seek confirm hypothesis use gold standard insulin sensitivity assessment : hyperinsulinemic-euglycemic clamp . It multicenter descriptive study .
DOC.brief_title: IRAPs ( Secreted Insulin Regulated AminoPeptidase ) : New Insulin Sensitivity Biomarker
DOC.criteria: Men woman ( sex ratio = 1 ) Aged 18 35 year Fasting glycemia < 6mmol/L Total cholesterol < 7mmol/L Triglycerides < 1.5 mmol/L CRPus < 5 mg/L Creatinine clearance < 80mL/min accord Cockroft formula Liver enzymes ( ALanine AminoTransférase ASpartate AminoTransférase ) < 1.5 time normal value Subject compliance recommendation French National Law force Medical history metabolic disease ( diabetes , dyslipidemia ) , endocrine disease , renal insufficiency Drug use could affect glucose metabolism renin angiotensin aldosterone system Blood pressure > 140/90mmHg Tea coffee consumption 5 cup per day Subject smoke 5 cigarette per day
